flawed_nl_solution:
Greg kept 1 granola bar for each of the 7 days of the week, so there were 20 - 7 = <<20-7=13>>13 bars left.
He traded 3 to his friend Pete, so there were 13 - 3 = 12 bars left.
His 2 sisters split the rest evenly, so each got 12 / 2 = <<12/2=6.0>>6.0 granola bars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
